>>Weather Béjar

The climatic conditions prevailing in Béjar are characterized by a warm and moderate temperature. The winter months are much rainier than the summer months in Béjar. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification is Csb. The mean temperature prevailing in the city of Béjar is recorded as 12.0 °C | 53.6 °F, according to statistical data. The annual precipitation in this location is approximately 838 mm | 33.0 inch.

Béjar is located in the northern hemisphere. The balmy days of Summer commence at the end of June and conclude in September. This period encompasses the months: June, July, August, September. The best time to travel is July, August.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Béjar

In terms of precipitation, the month with the lowest amount of rainfall is July, recording a mere 15 mm | 0.6 inch in its entirety. This denotes an exceptionally dry period within that particular time frame. Most of the precipitation here falls in October, averaging 116 mm | 4.6 inch.

average temperature by month Béjar

The month that experiences the highest temperatures throughout the year is referred to as August, where an average temperature of 22.0 °C | 71.6 °F prevails. January is the coldest month, with temperatures averaging 3.6 °C | 38.5 °F.

There exists a variation of 101 mm | 4 inch in precipitation levels between the month with the least rainfall and that which experiences maximum downpour. Throughout the year, temperatures vary by 18.4 °C | 33.0 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is January (77.60 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (41.86 %). The wettest month is April (11.90 days). The driest month is July (3.23 days).

Total hours of sun

In this location, the month that receives most sunshine is July, with a mean number of daily hours being 12.6. Across the entire duration of said calendar period there are an aggregate total of 390.54 hours' worth of sunlight.

In Béjar, the month that experiences the least number of daily sunshine hours is January with an average duration of 5.24 hours per day. The total amount of sunlight recorded during this period in question stands at a sum total of 162.49.

In Béjar, an average of 99.07 hours of sunshine are counted per month and around 3018.46 hours throughout the year.
